price: Àwa l’A yan kádàrá (ọjọ́) ikú fún gbogbo yín. Kò sì sí ẹni tó lè dá Wa lágara
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
